definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to begin an undertaking/to start a major task/to initiate/to venture/venture/entrepreneurship
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to create/original creation/to be the first to do sth

sentences.english: Quality image, brand name benefit, do the proven route, right-time & right-place development.
sentences.chinese: 树精品意识，创品牌效益，走规模道路，抢时机发展？

sentences.english: Iwill give you a call after I contact the Front Office about the rollaway.
sentences.chinese: 我与前厅部联系您家创的有关事宜后马上给你回电话。

sentences.english: Practice-creation is the essence of Marx's freedom-living idea.
sentences.chinese: 实践创生性是马克思自由生存观的本质。

sentences.english: All sorts of seamless steel tube production and the highest are over.
sentences.chinese: 各种无缝钢管产销量均创历年来的同期最高。

sentences.english: Brand pursuing: Jinquan's commitment is to satisfy customer, Jinquan's pursuing is to create quality brand.
sentences.chinese: 使客户满意是锦泉的承诺，创优质品牌是锦泉的追求。

sentences.english: Already, colleges and universities are making entrepreneurship the fastest-growing field of study on campus.
sentences.chinese: 研究创事业精力已然成为大学里成长最快的一个领域。

sentences.english: In order to achieve brand strategy, creating famous product to do rebay.
sentences.chinese: 为进一步实现名牌战略，创名优产品做准备。

sentences.english: Create Hongye products sold throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 创鸿业产品畅销全国各地。

sentences.english: Honda sets all-time monthly record for production in China.
sentences.chinese: 本田在华产量创空前月度记录。

sentences.english: So the projects management is not only the window of the enterprise but also the key of the enterprise creating high quality engineering.
sentences.chinese: 项目管理是企业的窗口，是企业创优质树品牌的关键。
人民币对美元创5年新高。

sentences.english: Permanent target of Xinlong: to create the top brand in the foodstuff machinery industry in China.
sentences.chinese: 创中国食品机械行业第一品牌，是鑫隆的永远目标。

sentences.english: Where there is life there is hope.
sentences.chinese: 生命满希望，前路由我创。

sentences.english: Total unemployment hit a 14-year high of 2.43 million in June.
sentences.chinese: 六月的总失业率达到了243万，创14年来新高。

sentences.english: Winners receive money to bring their business plans to reality.
sentences.chinese: 赢家可以得到创业基金使他们的创计划变成现实。

sentences.english: But most notably for Wang, he set a career high with 10 strikeouts.
sentences.chinese: 但对王最值得一提的，是他创生涯新高的10次三振。

definition: variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")
to renovate/to refurbish/to refresh (computer window)/to write a new page (in history)/to break (a record)
to exceed/to go beyond/to transcend/to cross over/to jump over
career/life (way in which sb lives)/period of one's life
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
strategic pass/barrier or mark (i.e. a level considered impressive, usually a round figure such as 10,000)/instrument of torture used to break limbs
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
